description: 1:1 speed tune synchronizes champion turns with Clan Boss turns. Each champion takes exactly 1 turn per CB turn. This ensures buffs and debuffs are applied in correct rotation, maximizes uptime, and prevents desynchronization. CRITICAL for CB UNM (without correct speed tune, buffs/debuffs expire early, team wipes).

speed_range.explanation: CB SPD is fixed at 170. Champions with SPD 171-189 take exactly 1 turn per CB turn. Below 171 SPD = CB takes extra turns before champion (buffs/debuffs expire early). Above 189 SPD = champion takes extra turns (buffs/debuffs desync, cooldowns out of rotation).
speed_range.formula: CB SPD 170 × 1.11 = 188.7 (round down to 189 max). Champions at 189 SPD take turn slightly before CB, then CB takes turn, then champions take next turn (1:1 ratio maintained).

turn_order_importance.description: Within 171-189 SPD range, turn order determines buff/debuff rotation. Slowest champion goes last each turn = designated stun target (receives CB stun). Fastest champion goes first = applies debuffs before other champions' turns.

recommended_order.reasoning: Decrease DEF must be active BEFORE other champions attack (increases team damage by 73%). Fastest champion applies Decrease DEF turn 1, all other champions benefit same turn.
Decrease ATK must be active BEFORE CB attacks (reduces CB damage by 50%). Second-fastest champion applies Decrease ATK turn 1, team survives CB attack same turn.
Buffs (Shield, Increase DEF, Continuous Heal) applied mid-rotation. All champions benefit from buffs by end of turn.
DPS champions attack after Decrease DEF active (maximize damage). No specific turn order requirement.

Slowest champion is stunned by CB (stun applied to slowest champion each 4 turns after turn 30). Designated stun target should be champion who can afford to lose 2 turns (Geomancer with revive passive OPTIMAL).

team_composition.notes: CORRECT. Fastest champion applies Decrease DEF + Decrease ATK turn 1 (A2). All other champions benefit from Decrease DEF same turn. Decrease ATK active before CB attacks.
CORRECT. Second-fastest champion applies Shield + Increase DEF buffs early. All champions benefit from buffs by mid-turn.
CORRECT. Mid-rotation buffer/healer applies Shield + Continuous Heal. Cleanse available for CB stun removal (A3 5-turn CD).
CORRECT. Mid-to-late rotation support extends buffs with A2 (all ally buffs +1 turn duration). Continuous Heal applied with A1/A3.
CORRECT. Slowest champion = designated stun target. Geomancer can revive with passive after 2 turns stunned (OPTIMAL). HP Burn A2 3-turn CD = can reapply after revive.

current_team_speed_tune.synchronization_status: FULLY SYNCHRONIZED. All champions 171-189 SPD, turn order optimized (Decrease DEF/ATK first, buffers mid, stun target last).

buff_debuff_rotation.description: With 1:1 speed tune, buffs and debuffs are applied in predictable rotation. This maximizes uptime and prevents gaps.

turn_1: Stag Knight A2: Decrease DEF 60% (2 turns) + Decrease ATK 50% (2 turns) applied
Brogni A3: Shield 24k (2 turns) + Increase DEF 60% (2 turns) applied
Mithrala A2: Shield 14k (2 turns) + Continuous Heal (2 turns) applied
Godseeker Aniri A3: Increase ATK 50% (2 turns) + Increase C.RATE 30% (2 turns) applied
Geomancer A2: HP Burn (2 turns) applied
END OF TURN: All buffs/debuffs active, CB attacks (Decrease ATK 50% = damage halved, Shield 24k + 14k = 38k absorbs most damage)
turn_2: Stag Knight A1: Damage + maintains Decrease DEF/ATK (A2 on 4-turn CD, ready turn 5)
Brogni A1: Cleanse attempt (50% chance) + Shield 15% caster MAX HP
Mithrala A1: Damage + Continuous Heal placed
Godseeker Aniri A2: Extend ALL ally buffs +1 turn duration (Decrease DEF/ATK, Shield, Increase DEF, Increase ATK, Increase C.RATE, Continuous Heal all extended to 2 turns remaining)

END OF TURN: All buffs/debuffs extended to 2 turns remaining (instead of expiring next turn), CB attacks (still reduced damage)
turn_3: All extended buffs/debuffs have 1 turn remaining (would have expired this turn without Godseeker Aniri A2)
Champions use A1 skills (damage + minor effects)
END OF TURN: Extended buffs/debuffs expire (Decrease DEF/ATK, Shield, Increase DEF, Increase ATK, Increase C.RATE), Continuous Heal still active (multiple sources)
turn_4: Stag Knight A2 ready: Reapply Decrease DEF 60% (2 turns) + Decrease ATK 50% (2 turns) (ZERO GAP, buffs/debuffs maintained)
Brogni A3 ready: Reapply Shield 24k (2 turns) + Increase DEF 60% (2 turns) (ZERO GAP)
Mithrala A2 ready: Reapply Shield 14k (2 turns) + Continuous Heal (2 turns)
Godseeker Aniri A3 ready: Reapply Increase ATK 50% (2 turns) + Increase C.RATE 30% (2 turns)
Geomancer A2 ready: Reapply HP Burn (2 turns) (ZERO GAP)
END OF TURN: Full buff/debuff rotation reset, cycle repeats

buff_debuff_rotation.uptime_optimization: With Godseeker Aniri A2 extending buffs turn 2, effective uptime increases from 50% (2 turns active, 2 turns inactive, 4-turn cycle) to 75% (3 turns active, 1 turn inactive, 4-turn cycle). This +50% uptime increase is CRITICAL for 60+ turn survival.

speed_tune_validation.description: To validate speed tune, run CB and observe turn order. All champions should take exactly 1 turn per CB turn. If champion takes 2 turns before CB, SPD too high (above 189). If CB takes 2 turns before champion, SPD too low (below 171).

common_issues.cause: SPD above 189 (e.g., SPD 195). Champion turn meter fills faster than CB.
common_issues.solution: Reduce SPD to 171-189 range. Remove speed sets, downgrade SPD substats, or remove speed lead (if accidentally active for CB).

common_issues.cause: SPD below 171 (e.g., SPD 165). Champion turn meter fills slower than CB.
common_issues.solution: Increase SPD to 171-189 range. Add speed sets, upgrade SPD substats, or use SPD boots (REQUIRED).

common_issues.cause: Turn order incorrect. Decrease DEF/ATK applied too late, or buff extension not timed correctly.
common_issues.solution: Reorder champion SPD. Decrease DEF/ATK applier should be FASTEST (189 SPD), buff extender should go mid-rotation (175-180 SPD) after buffs applied.

common_issues.cause: Designated stun target NOT slowest champion. Another champion has lower SPD than intended stun target.
common_issues.solution: Ensure designated stun target (Geomancer) has LOWEST SPD (171 SPD). All other champions must have SPD > 171.

advantages: SIMPLE to build: Only requires SPD 171-189 (achievable with SPD boots + moderate SPD substats)
PREDICTABLE rotation: Buffs/debuffs applied in same order every turn (easy to plan)
ZERO buff/debuff gaps: With correct turn order + Godseeker Aniri buff extension, buffs/debuffs maintained 75% uptime (vs 50% without extension)
WORKS for all affinities: No affinity-specific tuning required (unlike unkillable comps)
disadvantages: LOWER damage potential: Compared to 2:1 speed tune (champions take 2 turns per CB turn = 2× damage potential). 1:1 tune typical damage 44M per key, 2:1 tune can reach 80M+ per key.
VULNERABLE to stun: CB stuns 1 champion every 4 turns after turn 30. Designated stun target loses 2 turns (if no revive passive, damage/survivability loss). Unkillable comps immune to stun.
REQUIRES correct turn order: If turn order wrong (e.g., Decrease DEF/ATK applied last instead of first), team damage drops 42% (Decrease DEF lost) or team wipes (Decrease ATK lost).

common_mistakes.mistake: Using HP% or DEF% boots instead of SPD boots
common_mistakes.explanation: HP% boots give +60% HP (Geomancer 60k → 96k HP, EHP 287k → 459k). HUGE EHP increase BUT SPD drops from 180 → 140 (out of 171-189 range). CB takes 2 turns before champion, buffs/debuffs expire early, team wipes.
common_mistakes.solution: ALWAYS use SPD boots for 1:1 tune (171-189 SPD REQUIRED). Use HP%/DEF% on chest/gloves instead. Accept lower EHP in exchange for correct speed tune.

common_mistakes.mistake: Not validating speed tune after gear changes
common_mistakes.explanation: After gear upgrade, champion SPD increases from 185 → 195 (above 189 max). Champion now takes 2 turns before CB, buffs/debuffs desync, cooldowns out of rotation, team wipes.
common_mistakes.solution: After EVERY gear change, recalculate ALL champion SPD. Ensure all champions 171-189 SPD. Run test CB fight to validate turn order.

common_mistakes.mistake: Wrong turn order (Decrease DEF/ATK applied last)
common_mistakes.explanation: If Stag Knight slowest champion (171 SPD) instead of fastest (189 SPD), Decrease DEF/ATK applied LAST each turn. Other champions attack BEFORE Decrease DEF active = 42% damage loss (1.73× multiplier not applied turn 1). CB attacks BEFORE Decrease ATK active = full damage taken = team wipes.
common_mistakes.solution: Decrease DEF/ATK applier MUST be fastest champion (189 SPD). Designated stun target MUST be slowest champion (171 SPD). Reorder SPD to match recommended turn order.

common_mistakes.mistake: Not using Godseeker Aniri buff extension optimally
common_mistakes.explanation: Godseeker Aniri A2 extends all ally buffs +1 turn. If used turn 1 (before buffs applied), extension wasted (no buffs to extend). If used turn 3 (after buffs expire), extension wasted (buffs already expired).
common_mistakes.solution: Godseeker Aniri A2 should be used turn 2 (after buffs applied turn 1, before buffs expire turn 3). This extends buffs from 2 turns → 3 turns (uptime 50% → 75%).
